title: Common Phrases: Observations (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Observations subcategory within Common Phrases. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: They have too much garbage in their garden.
cards.romaji: Karera no niwa ni wa gomi ga takusan arimasu.
cards.japanese: 彼らの庭にはゴミがたくさんあります。
